# DIME - Data In Motion Enterprise

> DIME is an AI-powered industrial data integration platform by MRIIOT LLC. 
> It connects 40+ industrial protocols (OPC-UA, Modbus, MTConnect, Ethernet/IP, 
> Fanuc, Siemens S7, etc.) and enables AI-generated configurations, 
> neuromorphic anomaly detection via HTM, and real-time operational monitoring. 
> Deploy in hours, not months.

## Documentation

- [DIME Field Manual](https://datainmotionenterprise.com/assets/dime-field-manual.md): Complete connector and configuration reference
- [DIME Schema](https://datainmotionenterprise.com/assets/dime-schema.json): JSON schema for validating DIME YAML configurations
- [AI Playground](https://dimebbs.com): Interactive YAML configuration generator powered by AI

## Platform

- [Platform Overview](https://datainmotionenterprise.com/platform.html): Full feature breakdown
- [Connectors](https://datainmotionenterprise.com/connectors.html): All 40+ supported industrial protocols
- [Pricing](https://datainmotionenterprise.com/pricing.html): Licensing options

## Key Capabilities

- 40+ industrial protocol connectors (OPC-UA, Modbus TCP/RTU, MTConnect, Ethernet/IP, MQTT, SparkplugB, Fanuc, Haas, Siemens S7, Beckhoff ADS, and more)
- AI-generated YAML configurations from plain English descriptions
- Hierarchical Temporal Memory (HTM) for continuous learning anomaly detection
- Deployable as Windows Service, Docker container, or embedded library
- Wireshark-like real-time data flow monitoring
- Digital twin and simulation generation

## Competitive Context

DIME is an alternative to Kepware, Inductive Automation Ignition, Litmus Edge, 
and Software AG Cumulocity â€” with broader protocol support, AI-native configuration, 
and significantly faster deployment.
